website_summaries.verdict: Creates beachy waves with extra protection and a great scent.
pros: Offers UV protection for your hair while also creating subtle waves
Lightweight with a great coconut scent
cons: A little goes a long way – using too much can make your hair feel greasy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of sea salt sprays and this is by far my favorite!! My hair is pretty straight but when I spray this product on my hair after a shower it drys with wave/texture! It makes it look fixed without having to do much! I’m very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: James M Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It really works !!
customer_reviews.text: I have super straight hair that will not hold a curl. I love this stuff. This is the only product that will give me beachy waved hair. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Fratt

customer_reviews.title: Go Easy On It
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers say, use sparingly. Use a layer or two, hair looks relaxed and easy! Too much, it turns to grease. Some night I try to do my hair in pin curls. When I wake up and it didn't turn out right and I hate my hair, many layers of this relaxes the hair into a more natural, more becoming look for the day. It erases my mistakes lol
customer_reviews.author: bluebox

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not to be dramatic but this is a game changer. I have wavy/frizzy hair (natural redhead) and this stuff tames it! It’s lightweight enough that I can go two days without washing my hair but still using the product! It keeps my waves clean and frizz down. I love it and I always get compliments on how my hair smells. This is now a holy grail item in my beauty bag
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Thickens my beard like Zeus
customer_reviews.text: Because of the scent, you instantly feel like vacation mode, pairs amazing with the smell of scented sun screen. I use sea salt daily for work but a different scent for my face. Love this product as the spray bottle always sprays a fine mist, never clogs up, and with a blow dryer you can go from thin to thick hair so fast. Truly don't understand the negative reviews, literally nothing wrong with this product, its exactly as described...
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Bumble and Bumble is much better choice
customer_reviews.text: If you have thick, heavy, hair .... I would not recommend. Once the product sets in thick hair, rather than producing beachy waves, it gets a bit sticky and makes you hair look ‘meh! If you want the beachy wave look, skip this and I recommend Bumble & Bumble .... it’s worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Textured Hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a pretty long time. My hair is super thin and flat. I style/straighten my hair and then lift my hair as I spray it. Then I flip my head over and turn my dryer on low speed to help it dry the product. Do not use anything but your fingers to style your hair now. If you need more lift, use Big Sexy Hair hairspray to pump up the volume. Don't suggest the hairspray if you're actually going to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: MT96

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product, sketchy purchase...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product several times before, from Target and similar retailers. This is NOT the same product- fragrance is nothing like its usual banana/ coconut, tropical scent. This smells moldy, stagnant, chemically? Hard to place this product's smell because it's so terrible and not at all what it should be. Do not purchase from amazon, buy in person to make sure you're getting the right product. And for almost $12 a bottle, I'm extremely disappointed and feeling ripped off...
customer_reviews.author: Lindee

customer_reviews.title: SO AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin hair after having surgery a year ago. This stuff is great! Adds volume and defrizzes my hair great without weighing it down at all. It's not sticky which I was worried about. My hair was so bouncy and my VERY little bit of natural wave looked so good. Sprayed it on towel dried hair and scrunched with my hands. Pinned it back a little after it dried and off I went. So easy. Will always have it for the Florida humidity.
customer_reviews.author: kristin kofler

customer_reviews.title: Beachy waves without the crunch
customer_reviews.text: It is very hot where I live in the summer so I try to air dry my hair often after showering. I like the beach wave look and this product is great and doesn’t leave my hair crunchy like other texture/beach wave products. My only complaint is that “somewhere” I read it was to protect scalp from burning. Now that I have it, I found out it has NO SPF. Disappointed but pleasantly surprised because it is a great product so it’s a win!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the frizzies away
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. It smells like coconut and leaves my hair with a beautiful beachy wave in a light hold. My hair has a light wave naturally but it can get frizzy and straighten out. This spray keeps this from happening. Works especially well in humid climates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, wavy, greasy root, & dry ends type hair. This leaves my hair in a ball of frizz. Every other one I've tried does the same so at least this one smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: This smells just like the beach. I like that it doesn’t make my hair dull like a lot of other salt sprays. I use it when I get out of the water and it adds nice waves. I have pretty straight hair and it adds just enough body. It is a salt spray, so don’t expect great softness. I use it with the condition spray.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: What happened here ugh
customer_reviews.text: Took 4 extra days to get here and it was Completely empty. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy d

customer_reviews.title: Must have natural wave
customer_reviews.text: Great product for naturally bodied hair. If your hair is poker straight it will just be really good smelling, salty, poker straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & smells like summer
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly happy with this purchase. I have been impressed with all the products from this brand. I have been using along with their shampoo and conditioner and my hair smells great and has retained it's natural wavy loose curls again. Very easy to use and doesn't leave a film or build up in my hair. Smell is very beachy fresh. Perfect for a quick touch up after the beach or a swim as well as a quick no fuss style in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I have mostly straight thin hair that I like to air dry. When I do it looks a little “slept on” so I hoped this product would give a nice wave to my hair. Unfortunately it didn’t add any more wave than I normally would have and left my hair feeling a little sticky and tangled. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: joslyn b

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine hair, this product works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair, this product works great for me. I curl my hair very loosely then spray this in at the end and scrunch my hair a bit. It creates a beach wave type look. The coconut smell is amazing, however the scent is light doesn't really stay in my hair all day. I like the scent so much I would prefer it to be stronger and if my hair smelled like the coconut scent all day.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried for years to find a product like this and I've been using bumble and bumble but I hate the way it makes my hair feel. This doesn't feel like there's anything in my hair and it smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: LoganA

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually only purchase high end salon products but I found this at a beach shop and fell in love! It gives my hair perfect beach waves! Perfect! Smells great and doesn’t make my hair crunchy. So easy to spray on and tossel my hair for a sexy look! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria K Richard

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR CURLY HAIR
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! This is perfect for day two curly hair. As my curly chicks know, washing your hair daily is a big no no if you don't want want frizzy ends. I was as bad as anyone for throwing my hair in a bun or damaging it with heat styling the day after washing but then I found this. I just wake up in the morning, spray all over with water, spray on this lovely stuff (which smells great btw), and scrunch. So good!!! Even my hairstylist couldn't believe I was rocking day two hair when I saw her last. 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but did not work for my type of hair
customer_reviews.text: Product has a pleasant smell. It does give you texture but not volume. I have wavy frizzy hair and would apply it on damp hair but my hair would dry stiff and clump together. Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: VIVIAN OLMEDO

customer_reviews.title: Almost got it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is worth the price just for its smell alone. It works good. It helps if the bottle arrives with the cap tightened and the bottle full. Mine did not. I don’t have a printer so returning this was a headache! Not worth buying again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Gives a little help to my fine hair curls
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair. I found a perm that actually works great for it but I need a bit of help between perms. This gives some texture and curl (scrunch) to the top area of my hair that has very little curl.
customer_reviews.author: DTB

customer_reviews.title: I spray this in my hair once every night before ...
customer_reviews.text: I spray this in my hair once every night before I go to bed and I've been using it for MONTHS and there's still a lot left it seems. This has lasted me maybe for 4-5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: If I could give this a -5 star I would. This stuff spoils!!! It started to smell rancid like spilled milk! So disgusting!!!!! I thought that I would love this from the reviews but it is not like the other high end sea salt sprays. It didn't work for my hair at all and all it did was make it wet, grrrr!!!
customer_reviews.author: LifeByCJ

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Love Sun Bum but was expecting the scent to last longer. Who doesn’t like smelling like the beach? A little advise, I noticed that it helps to brush it through the hair and air dry. The product definitely does better evenly distributed
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Thellman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed even after the rave Buzzfeed review. I saw no difference whatsoever in the texture or “waves” in my hair—perhaps this is meant for people with stick-straight hair not for curly hair. It smells nice is about all I can say. Now I’m stuck with a $12 bottle of beach smell.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray, I put it on damp towel dried hair and it gives me a soft beachy wave. I do not feel like it drys my hair out at all like some other reviews have said. I will repurchase when I finish this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine DeMoss

customer_reviews.title: Either rancid or just plain reeks!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this the other day and can already tell you the smell is putrid!! I don’t know if this stuff is rancid, but for the amount of money it cost I’m returning. I also ordered the dry shampoo which smells halfway decent, but this stuff reeks!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: wet look in my husbands hair like a lot of male hair products do
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leave a greasy, wet look in my husbands hair like a lot of male hair products do. The beach smell is pretty awesome during the cold New England months.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great spray. 2nd time purchasing - love the smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Great spray. 2nd time purchasing - love the smaller bottle too. I have lots of fine hair and this really helps build up that volume without the crunch.
customer_reviews.author: clearface

customer_reviews.title: ... wanting to try this for a while and I LOVE it. It's really great at enhancing wavy hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to try this for a while and I LOVE it. It's really great at enhancing wavy hair without being crispy, stringy, or heavy. Most other sea salt sprays are drying, and this one seems pretty moisturizing and light weight. It also smells great.
customer_reviews.author: ticky128

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Left my hair feeling very stiff and sticky. Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Teachergirl06

customer_reviews.title: Had to transfer into a spray bottle that I had water in for the iron
customer_reviews.text: Broken sprayer never worked - Had to transfer into a spray bottle that I had water in for the iron
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best texturizer I've used! Texturizes hair without making it stiff. The coconut smell is AMAZING but it doesn't last all day. I'll be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Grote

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Using sea salt in my hair has helped boost its curls and lay down on the frizz. I didn’t know what a great sea salt spray was until I used this one. It leaves my hair bouncy and soft, without that added crunch. Will buy again. ALSO LOVE THE SMELL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Malkasian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I found myself spraying this in my hair constantly during a recent beach vacation. It has a great smell and kept my hair neat and conditioned. It's now a must-have in the beach bag when we go to the pool or beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. Works awesome... doesn’t weigh my hair down!
customer_reviews.author: JVGIRL

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have in my Beach Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use it straight out of the pool/ocean on semi wet hair and scrunch with a damp towel for effortless beach curls with no heat, no crunchy curls or sticky residue. You can literally go directly from the water to night time cocktails/dinner with perfect easy style curls. Obsessed. Have repurchsed every summer!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McGill

customer_reviews.title: Over Priced
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad and doesnt do anything to your hair I have straight and boring hair and I thought this product would help give it some texture but it only made my hair smell salty im disappointed for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells like the beach and gives you that salty ocean water hair
customer_reviews.author: Laura L Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Not great for thick/full hair
customer_reviews.text: Does not volumize full hair very well. Actually left my hair kind of weighted down.
customer_reviews.author: numberonebun

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It gives my hair just the right amount of texture after washing so that its not too "clean" feeling and holds the curl much better.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy N.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible smell
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair and this product made my day. The sea salt spray not only smells amazing but it helps make my hair look thicker. It leaves my hair looking and smelling amazing. I would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beach waved hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I have straight, heavy thick hair. Sometimes my hair is just so heavy and I don’t feel like doing much to it. I will spray some of this in my hair while it’s damp, put it in a bun, then let it down a few hours later and itnhas volume and beach like waves.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Gives my hair a lot of texture and volume. It's really lightweight and smells so good like going to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: kat W

customer_reviews.title: Water Works Too!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really notice anything but the AMAZING banana boat smell. Otherwise just water for me
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Michele
customer_reviews.text: The product made my hair dryer than what promised did not like the way it felt at all
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Simple, affordable option with a great scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bottle of this several months ago and have stopped using any other hair styling product altogether. It is super simple to use, really does smell great, and is on the cheaper side of any other alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Beach curls
customer_reviews.text: Love all things sun bum, great product. Revives my curls every time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Smells super good but I don’t love the sticky feeling in my hair after
customer_reviews.author: Katie Matta

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Like to use this when I dont feel like blow drying my hair.
customer_reviews.author: longbeeye

customer_reviews.title: Look like you just got back from the beach
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Exactly like swimming on the beach and having salty hair. Wavey and full of body. Smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: For SPF qualities
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the sun protection. So far my hair has maintained its color after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Superdude91

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sprays I’ve come across. I love the beach look and this stuff makes it happen!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes styling your hair very easy and creates amazing beach waves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have fine, curly hair. I use it before I put my hair in a ponytail or bun, it makes it more manageable. I also use it in between washes, instead of gel/mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: The bottle was opened and empty >:(
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was opened and empty so i hate this and im super mad >:/
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The smell is good- but weird. It has a salt beach smell. Does create a lot of volume
customer_reviews.author: Othatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Sticky frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan, this product made my hair sticky and frizzy, even on a low humidity day. I didn't have beachy waves at all. I did like the scent of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Bree E

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love it, use it every day to get a little extra texture to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and does the job right. Gives your hair some body rather than weighing it down.
customer_reviews.author: Alexw

customer_reviews.title: and the product is amazing! I had beach waves all day
customer_reviews.text: The smell reminds me of being on the beach! and the product is amazing! I had beach waves all day, and they were soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Texturized well
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: G.S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing best ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m do obsessed with Sun Bum line and this is now my new favorite ever!!! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: KelliAnn Husband

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. No vacation this year but fragrance of spray reminded of the ocean
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Moore

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this product smells
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product smells. It doesn't do anything truly amazing to my hair, but it does give it a bit of texture.
customer_reviews.author: Jana R.

customer_reviews.title: Squirt mechanism not working
customer_reviews.text: Well, difficult to know how to rate this as the squirt mechanism is not squirting anything. How does one work this thing?
customer_reviews.author: diazgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good product from SunBum. I like the lightness it gives to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: MalNow

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and cool packaging, but product arrived completely defective and nozzle will not spray (spitters liquid) so pretty uselsess
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pelaez

customer_reviews.title: Quick styling
customer_reviews.text: Great product for thick dense straight hair, helps keep my hair up during the day doesn’t wear out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Use it every time I go swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Aslihan D.

customer_reviews.title: Broken package/ bottle
customer_reviews.text: Package was ripped when I received it and half the contents were spilled everywhere. Got other products in same package wet
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Val

customer_reviews.title: The best beach hair product I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: The best beach hair product I've used so far. I have fine short wavy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Decker

customer_reviews.title: Towel dried look all day
customer_reviews.text: I spray it on wet towel dried hair and brush through. Perfect all day. After it’s dry you can even run wet finger through and restyle. Perfect light weight style and texture option.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Priest

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last as long as I would've liked.
customer_reviews.text: Adds solid volume. Doesn't last as long as I would've liked.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Most important is it does what it says it should do
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my daughters long hair, And it works makes her waves come out even more and gives a nice volume and it is soft not like hairspray
customer_reviews.author: Harutyun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives good texture and body but I find it leaves flyaways frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: not coarse or thick so it worked great for me by adding texture without feeling heavy
customer_reviews.text: My hair is curly and very soft, not coarse or thick so it worked great for me by adding texture without feeling heavy! The only problem I had was that the sprayer did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products from the Sun Bum hair products line
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite products from the Sun Bum hair products line. Just wish they made a bigger bottle. I order 2 every month.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This spray is great! It really makes my hair very wavy. However, use sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Don't Pay Full Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this at a discounted price, and was very happy. Would not want to pay full $20 for regular price.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Great spray for beachy waves
customer_reviews.text: Great spray, holds wave very well and smells absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great but tangly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's a great texturizing spray. I may use a little less next time because the hair gets REALLY tangly(but that's what texturizes it right?). Although, I will say that I naturally have incredibly fine, tangly hair anyway without any product so I'd expect this to happen. It makes it a bit frizzy just like the beach does, which is what I want because I have very straight boring hair. My husband said "I really like your hair like that" so the fact that he noticed had me like whaaaaaa. Anyway, I'm glad I bought it. Kind of a pain (tangles) but worth it. I'll likely use this every time I curl my hair.
customer_reviews.author: angie smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dry out your hair like the alcohol based sea sprays will.
customer_reviews.author: katylizze

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Smells great and does exactly what it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Smells great and does exactly what it's supposed to. Only thing missing is the actual day at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: R. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: this product is excellent. I feel like I'm having a great hair ...
customer_reviews.text: this product is excellent. I feel like I'm having a great hair day every day when I use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ferita

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $14!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this due to a top magazine giving it a high rating must try... I completely disagree. Spray smells great, doesn't do anything. I'll keep buying Not Your Mother's brand. This was a total waste of money. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and did what I needed it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, but it doesn't seem to give me any curl/scrunch like other texturing sprays. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: loved it! smelled good, made my hair soft and wasn't oily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Empty container received
customer_reviews.text: This showed up empty. I paid for an empty container. And now I need to ship it back?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPF For the hair
customer_reviews.text: Product is good for the beach, gives some beach waves
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Only used it a few times but so far I like it.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Only used it a few times but so far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: kylie ward

customer_reviews.title: Smells like paradise
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing sea salt spray adding texture and volume. You can't beat the amazing smell of coconut and paradise!
customer_reviews.author: Molls

customer_reviews.title: smells great
customer_reviews.text: I put on my hair when I go to pool/beach/yard work to protect my hair
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Davey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about how awesome this product line is....My husband and I use all the products religiously.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Sun Bum products. I grew up at the beach but no longer live there, but love having that beach blown look. Many of these types of hair care products come in small sizes...love that this is actually a functional size that works great and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Canter

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this product. The spray pump doesn't work, and now I guess I'll have to go through the trouble of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Saylor

product_meta.title: Sun Bum Sea Spray|Texturizing and Volumizing Sea Salt Spray | UV Protection With a Matte Finish | Medium Hold | For All Hair Types | 6 FL OZ Spray Bottle, Clear (80-41025)
product_meta.description: Sun Bum Texturizing Sea Salt Spray for hair protects your hair from the elements while giving it extra body, waves, and texture for that beach windswept look. Our lightweight formula enhances strand separation and definition, instantly blocking humidity that causes frizz. It'll give your hair just the right amount of volume with a matte-finish hold. Enriched with Hawaiian black lava sea salt, kelp and seaweed, it will keep your locks looking and feeling healthy. This Sea Salt Spray is color safe and can be used on all hair types and textures. As an added bonus, this sea salt hairspray offers protection from damaging UV Rays which prevents your hair from becoming dull, brittle and discolored. Sun lovers rejoice!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
